files.patch:
@@ -193,0 +193,8 @@ + *

+ * Either {@linkplain Boolean#FALSE Boolean.FALSE} or an integer value lesser than {@code 0} + * can be passed to {@link #setOption(int, Object)} to disable this option. An integer + * value {@code >= 0} passed to {@code setOption(int, Object)} will enable the option and + * the value will represent the linger timeout. + *

+ * If this option is enabled then {@link #getOption(int)} will return an integer value + * representing the linger timeout, else the return value will be {@code Boolean.FALSE}.
